definition: Kamakura city in Kanagawa prefecture 神奈川縣|神奈川县[Shen2 nai4 chuan1 xian4], Japan

barn/granary/storehouse/cabin/hold (in ship)
Kamakura bakufu 1192-1333, the first Japanese samurai shogunate

sentences.english: A visitor took photos of the candlelit miniature Kamakura, or snow huts, on Monday during the Kamakura Snow Festival in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 一名游客在日本镰仓冰雪节的微型镰仓前拍照流年。

sentences.english: In addition, Kamakura's sand beaches attract large crowds during the summer months.
sentences.chinese: 此外，镰仓夏日的沙滩也吸引着大量游客。
